meanings.meaning: work your way through college, round the world, etc.

vlive.korean: 새벽에 하시잖아요 저 같은 일이 벌어... If you do it late at night, then the same thing will happen. 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 안자는사람!!!
vlive.english: If you do it late at night, then the same thing will happen.

vlive.korean: [달려 달려 내가 벌어 내가 사치 O] - '내가 벌어 내가 사치' - 정답! [Run, run I make and waste my own money] - "I make and waste my own money". - Correct! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.91
vlive.english: [Run, run I make and waste my own money] - "I make and waste my own money". - Correct!

vlive.korean: 삼백안 돈 많이 벌어요? The rich has Sanpaku eyes? 듣기 View video WIWO : mamamoo Hwa Sa makeup 마마무 화사 커버메이크업
[토크 주제4. 돈 벌자] 돈을 언제 벌어? When will you make money? 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 홍석천 사장님과 단둘이 점심 먹은 샤넌 <지금 홍식당으로 알바갑니다> 7회
[준비하는 사이] 얼마 벌어왔냐? [While they are preparing] How much did you earn? 듣기 View video iKON : iKON - ‘자체제작 iKON TV’ EP.3-5
vlive.english: [While they are preparing] How much did you earn?

examples.korean: Last year, she pocketed over $1 million in advertising contracts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 작년에 그녀는 광고 계약으로 100만 달러 이상을 벌어 들였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Last year, she pocketed over $1 million in advertising contracts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What’s the good of earning all that money if you don’t have time to enjoy it? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 즐길 시간이 없으면 그 돈을 다 벌어 봐야 무슨 소용이 있어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What’s the good of earning all that money if you don’t have time to enjoy it? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Many families struggle to make ends meet. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 많은 가족들이 아등바등 돈을 벌어 겨우 먹고 산다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many families struggle to make ends meet. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘How much does he earn?’ ‘Quite a bit!’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그가 돈을 얼마나 벌지?” “상당히 많이 벌어!” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘How much does he earn?’ ‘Quite a bit!’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He earns 6 figures, yet he’s still so tight with his money. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사람은 억대 연봉을 벌어. 하지만 아직도 자기 돈 가지고 정말 빡빡하게 굴어. DARAKWON
examples.english: He earns 6 figures, yet he’s still so tight with his money. Add to Wordbook
